meta.title: Service Price List | Innolease
meta.description: Explore Innolease's comprehensive service price list. Transparent pricing for car leasing, equipment rental, and our other services.
meta.keywords: service price list, leasing prices, car leasing prices, equipment leasing prices, rental prices, Innolease

section1.heading: Our Service Price List
texts: Innolease offers transparent and competitive pricing for all our services. Our pricing is based on fairness and long-term customer relationships.
All prices include VAT and are valid until further notice. Detailed quotes are always customized to meet customer needs.

section2.heading: Car Leasing - Setup Costs
texts: One-time costs and processing fees related to starting car leasing.

section3.heading: Monthly Leasing Rates
texts: The prices below are indicative monthly payments for 36-month leasing contracts. Final prices depend on vehicle value, contract period, and additional services.

section4.heading: Additional Services and Options
texts: We offer a comprehensive range of additional services that make your leasing experience smooth and worry-free.
list: 24/7 roadside assistance included in all contracts

section5.heading: Customer Stories - Savings Examples
texts: See how our customers have saved by choosing Innolease services.

cases.title: Small business saves €2000 per year
texts: A Helsinki-based IT company switched their company car to leasing and saves significantly annually on taxation and maintenance costs. Fixed monthly payment simplifies budgeting.

cases.title: Family found their dream car
texts: A Tampere family was able to drive their dream electric car without a large initial investment. Leasing enabled testing new technology with low risk.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions About Pricing
texts: Answers to the most common questions about pricing.

questions.question: Do the prices include VAT?
questions.answer: Yes, all prices in our price list include value-added tax (24%). For business customers, we can offer VAT-free prices.

questions.question: Can prices be negotiated?
questions.answer: Yes, for long-term customers and larger orders, we can offer special prices. Contact our sales team to discuss options.

questions.question: Do prices change during the contract period?
questions.answer: Monthly payments remain fixed throughout the entire contract period. Possible index increases are agreed upon in advance in the contract.

cta.heading: Need a Personal Price Quote?
texts: Contact our experts and we'll create a customized quote just for you. Free consultation and pricing.

calculator.heading: Leasing Calculator
calculator.text: Calculate your own monthly payment easily
